Indiegogo - San Francisco, CA - Full Time Software Engineer (mobile & web)

=====================

Indiegogo empowers people around the world to fund what matters to them. As the largest global crowdfunding platform, campaigns have launched from every country around the world with millions of dollars being distributed every week due to contributions made by the Indiegogo community. At its core, Indiegogo is the equal opportunity platform dedicated to democratizing the way people raise funds for any project â€“ creative, entrepreneurial or cause-related. The company was launched in 2008 and is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices in Los Angeles and New York.

We are looking to grow our engineering team with engineers of all sorts web (rails/angular), iOS, Android and generalists are encouraged to apply.
